attacker.name: Raze
attacker.description: She has grenades on her waist and a boom bot hanging from her shoulder. A rocket launcher is strapped onto her back, and it looks like she won't leave without putting up a fight.

attacker.name: Sova
attacker.description: He has a piercing blue eye; the other is covered up with an eye patch. He has a bow with three long-range, energy blasts that he is ready to use. Looks like he isn't going anywhere without a fight.

attacker.name: Sage
attacker.description: She is standing looking at you behind a bright sage glow, with blue spheres hanging around her waist. She looks like an angel, but she is definitely not.

attacker.name: Pheonix
attacker.description: He covers the room in flames. You see him holding a ball of fire ready to throw; it's not burning him at all.

attacker.name: Cypher
attacker.description: He has a wide-brimmed hat with a menacing look. A mask covers his lower face, and all you can see is his death stare. He looks dark and mysterious.

attacker.name: Yoru
attacker.description: He turns around in a flash and then teleports to another corner. All you can catch is a glimpse of his blue hair.

attacker.name: Killjoy
attacker.description: She looks like a nice girl, with her red lipstick and green hat. But her robot has a weird face, almost like he's ready to kill.

attacker.name: Reyna
attacker.description: She emerges from thin air with a purple glow. Her arms are covered in purple fog and tattoos. She looks scary, not angelic in any way.

attacker.name: Viper
attacker.description: She comes out of a large green cloud with poison around her waist. A mask covers the lower half of her face, her green eyes almost carving a hole in you.

attacker.name: Breach
attacker.description: He's half-robot, half-human, and he is coming out of the walls. He looks at you straight in the eyes with his robotic hand pointed at you.
